doc.title: Clipeado
doc.plot: A washed up producer gets it on with a reality network and launches CLIPPED, a killer reality show featuring America's favorite home videos of extreme accidental death clips. When it's announced the winner will receive a ten million dollar prize, everyone maneuvers to win it. Ratings skyrocket and Americans go insane to watch this morbid and yet crazily fun show. "Yooooou've been clipped!" is the tag line on everyone's lips. Kids flock to join the "Clipper Club" - deaths are faked, murders are committed and gruesome fatalities plague the screen hoping for a shot at fame and fortune; until the producers find themselves in the middle of lawsuits, moral debates, and all out pandemonium in the media. There's only one-way out for the network and producers; someone's going to get "clipped" or die trying. If you're going to "get clipped" it better be worth it; ten million worth it, that is.
